label: A2BC4_tP7_111_e_b_n-001
title: $E3_{1}$ ($\beta$-Ag$_{2}$HgI$_{4}$) Structure
comments:
(Ketelaar, 1931) determined this pseudo-cubic structure for $\beta$-Ag$_{2}$HgI$_{4}$, and (Hermann, 1937) assigned it the {\em Strukturbericht} symbol $E3_{1}$. Later, (Browall, 1974) showed that $\beta$-Ag$_{2}$HgI$_{4}$ takes the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC4_tI14_82_bc_a_g-001}{Al$_{2}$CdS$_{4}$ structure}, which (Pearson, 1967) listed as {\em Strukturbericht} $E3$. 
 The CdIn$_{2}$Se$_{4}$ structure found by (Hahn, 1955) does seem to be in this phase, so we have removed the ``obsolete'' label.
